english_example_sentence: If only we had sat a bit longer on that beautiful bench with a view.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы посидели немного подольше на той красивой скамейке с видом.
turkish_example_sentence: Keşke o güzel manzaralı bankta biraz daha otursaydık.
